title: If Riot Games Inc. has upset you, please read!
body:
Hey guys! Just another regular guy with common sense here. Just got my 14 day suspension on another account. I was told to kill myself by a duo q! (Isn't that nice) I actually carried that game as twitch ( got a pentakill and was 21-8 or something) anyways i like this game A LOT! Love the competetiveness! But i think............ WE CAN ALL AGREE...............

that this company is out for our wallets O.O

I have done some research and and an experiment, I took an account and typed the same exact things in chat as the account that i purchased RP on and it turns out i was banned within a few games of the accounts i purchased RP on and the one's i didnt i was never even chat restricted... seems fishy huh? Well that's because it is!

So for all of you wondering if you should stop playing this game? I think you should.

Dunkey, Tyler1, and many others are treated unfairly because they are getting a lot of money through streams and youtube and competing with the proffessional streamers, open your eyes guys. We need to boycott this game im afraid.

So who's with me?
